message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: and i make up excuses every time as to why i can't go by myself to my tuition thats 3 mins away.
Him: Guess we gotta enroll you in excuse-making 101, 'cause your skills are legendary. 😂

CONVERSATION 2
Her: and i make up excuses every time as to why i can't go by myself to my tuition thats 3 mins away.
Him: Walking 3 mins? That's a whole workout, better rest up for the next session. 😅

CONVERSATION 3
Her: and i make up excuses every time as to why i can't go by myself to my tuition thats 3 mins away.
Him: 3 mins away? So you're basically saying it's a long-distance relationship with your tuition. Cringe. 🚶‍♂️💔

CONVERSATION 4
Her: and i make up excuses every time as to why i can't go by myself to my tuition thats 3 mins away.
Him: You're not alone, I can't even go to the fridge without a solid game plan. #relatable

CONVERSATION 5
Her: and i make up excuses every time as to why i can't go by myself to my tuition thats 3 mins away.
Him: If procrastination was an Olympic sport, you'd be the GOAT, no cap. 🐐
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : and i make up excuses every time as to why i can't go by myself to my tuition thats 3 mins away.  
        Him : Him : anayirp. im sorry i really am. nobody should have gone through that. 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
